00028 eolBool eol_sprite_initialized()
00029 {
00030   return _sprite_init;

00032 
00033 void eol_sprite_init()
00034 {
00035   eol_logger_message(EOL_LOG_INFO,"eol_sprites: initializing\n");
00036   
00037   _num_sprites = 0;
00038   _sprite_list = (eolSprite *)malloc(sizeof(eolSprite)*_max_sprites);
00039   memset(_sprite_list,0,sizeof(eolSprite)*_max_sprites);
00040   eol_graphics_register_resize(eol_sprite_resync_graphics_view);
00041   atexit(eol_sprite_close);
00042   _sprite_init = eolTrue;
00043   eol_logger_message(EOL_LOG_INFO,"eol_sprites: initialized\n");
00044 }
00045 
00046 eolSprite *eol_sprite_get_loaded_by_filename(eolLine filename)
00047 {
00048   int i;
00049   if ((_sprite_list == NULL)||(!_sprite_init))
00050   {
00051     eol_logger_message(
00052       EOL_LOG_ERROR,
00053       "eol_sprite:sprite system initialized\n"
00054     );
00055     return NULL;
00056   }
00057   for (i = 0;i < _max_sprites;i++)
00058   {
00059     if (_sprite_list[i]._refCount)
00060     {
00061       if (strcmp(_sprite_list[i].filename,filename)==0)
00062         return &_sprite_list[i];
00063     }
00064   }
00065   return NULL;
00066 }
00067 
00068 eolSprite *eol_sprite_new()
00069 {
00070   int i;
00071   /*makesure we have the room for a new sprite*/
00072   if(_num_sprites >= _max_sprites)
00073   {
00074     eol_logger_message(
00075         EOL_LOG_ERROR,
00076         "eol_sprite: Maximum Sprites Reached.\n"
00077     );
00078     return NULL;
00079   }
00080   for(i = 0;i < _max_sprites;i++)
00081   {
00082     if(_sprite_list[i]._refCount == 0)break;
00083   }
00084   if (i == _max_sprites)
00085   {
00086     eol_logger_message(
00087         EOL_LOG_ERROR,
00088         "sprite count error!");
00089     return NULL;
00090   }
00091   memset(&_sprite_list[i],0,sizeof(eolSprite));
00092   _sprite_list[i]._refCount = 1;
00093   _num_sprites++;
00094   return &_sprite_list[i];
00095 }
00096 
00097 eolSprite *eol_sprite_load(
00098     eolLine filename,
00099     eolUint frameWidth,
00100     eolUint frameHeight
00101   )
00102 {
00103   int k,j;
00104   SDL_Surface *temp;
00105   SDL_Surface *temp1;
00106   int w, h;
00107   Uint32 clearColor;
00108   Uint8 r,g,b,a;
00109   /*first see if the sprite is already in memory*/
00110   eolSprite *newSprite = NULL;
00111   if ((!filename) || (strlen(filename) <= 0))
00112   {
00113     eol_logger_message(
00114       EOL_LOG_ERROR,
00115       "eol_sprite:cannot load a sprite of empty filename.\n");
00116     return NULL;
00117   }
00118   newSprite = eol_sprite_get_loaded_by_filename(filename);
00119   if (newSprite != NULL)
00120   {
00121     newSprite->_refCount++;
00122     return newSprite;
00123   }
00124   /*now get a new blank sprite*/
00125   newSprite = eol_sprite_new();
00126   if (newSprite == NULL)
00127   {
00128     /*out of space for new sprites!*/
00129     eol_logger_message(
00130         EOL_LOG_ERROR,
00131         "eol_sprite: out of sprite slots.!\n");
00132     return NULL;
00133   }
00134   /*begin new sprite loading and construction*/
00135   temp = _eol_load_image(filename);
00136   /*temp = IMG_Load(filename);
00137   */
00138   if(temp == NULL)
00139   {
00140     eol_logger_message(
00141         EOL_LOG_ERROR,
00142         "unable to load a sprite\n");
00143     return NULL;
00144   }
00145   temp1 = SDL_DisplayFormatAlpha(temp);
00146   strncpy(newSprite->filename,filename,80);
00147   
00148   newSprite->framesPerLine = 16;
00149   /*if width is not specified, assume whole image is a single frame*/
00150   if(frameWidth != -1)
00151   {
00152     newSprite->frameWidth = frameWidth;
00153     newSprite->frameHeight = frameHeight;
00154   }
00155   else
00156   {
00157     newSprite->frameWidth = temp1->w;
00158     newSprite->frameHeight = temp1->h;
00159   }
00160   /*makes sure the width and height of the entire surface is opengl compatable*/
00161   newSprite->imageWidth = w = temp1->w;
00162   newSprite->imageHeight = h = temp1->h;
00163 
00164   newSprite->_sdlSurface = SDL_CreateRGBSurface(
00165     SDL_HWSURFACE|SDL_SRCALPHA,
00166     w,
00167     h,
00168     _graphics_view.depth,
00169     _graphics_view.rMask,
00170     _graphics_view.gMask,
00171     _graphics_view.bMask,
00172     _graphics_view.aMask
00173   );
00174 
00175   /*Sets the clear color on the surface*/
00176   clearColor = SDL_MapRGBA(newSprite->_sdlSurface->format, 0, 0, 0,255);
00177   /* 
00178    * This goes through the pixel data copying it and checking each pixel for the
00179    * clear color, when found sets the alpha to 0
00180    */
00181   for(k=0;k < newSprite->_sdlSurface->h; k++)
00182   {
00183     for(j=0;j < newSprite->_sdlSurface->w; j++)
00184     {
00185       SDL_GetRGBA(eol_graphics_get_pixel(temp1, j, k), temp1->format, &r, &g, &b, &a);
00186       eol_graphics_put_pixel(newSprite->_sdlSurface, j, k, SDL_MapRGBA(newSprite->_sdlSurface->format, r, g, b, a));
00187       
00188     }
00189   }
00190   if (_graphics_view.openGLOn)
00191   {
00192     newSprite->frameTextureWidth = (float)newSprite->frameWidth/(float)w;
00193     newSprite->frameTextureHeight= (float)newSprite->frameHeight/(float)h;
00194 
00195     eol_sprite_set_gl_coordinates(newSprite);
00196 
00197     glGenTextures(1, &newSprite->_glImage);
00198     glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D,newSprite->_glImage);
00199 
00200     if(_graphics_view.mipmapping == 1)
00201     {
00202       glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_MAG_FILTER, GL_NEAREST);
00203       glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_MIN_FILTER, GL_NEAREST_MIPMAP_LINEAR);
00204       gluBuild2DMipmaps(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_RGBA, w, h, GL_RGBA, GL_UNSIGNED_BYTE,
00205           newSprite->_sdlSurface->pixels);
00206     }
00207     else
00208     {
00209       glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_MAG_FILTER, GL_NEAREST);
00210       glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_MIN_FILTER, GL_LINEAR);
00211       glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_WRAP_S, GL_REPEAT);
00212       glTexImage2D(GL_TEXTURE_2D, 0, GL_RGBA, w, h, 0, GL_RGBA, GL_UNSIGNED_BYTE,
00213           newSprite->_sdlSurface->pixels);
00214     }
00215 
00216     SDL_FreeSurface(newSprite->_sdlSurface);
00217     newSprite->_sdlSurface = NULL;
00218   }
00219   SDL_FreeSurface(temp1);
00220   temp1 = NULL;
00221   SDL_FreeSurface(temp);
00222   temp = NULL;
00223   return newSprite;
00224 }
00225 
00226 void eol_sprite_resync_graphics_view(eolGraphicsView info)
00227 {
00228   int i;
00229   memcpy(&_graphics_view,&info,sizeof(eolGraphicsView));
00230   if (_sprite_list == NULL)
00231   {
00232     return;
00233   }
00234   for (i = 0; i < _max_sprites; i++)
00235   {
00236     if (_sprite_list[i]._refCount <= 0)
00237       continue;
00238     eol_sprite_set_gl_coordinates(&_sprite_list[i]);
00239   }
00240 }

00242 void eol_sprite_draw_3d(
00243     eolSprite *sprite,
00244     eolUint frame,
00245     eolVec3D position,
00246     eolVec3D scale,
00247     eolFloat alpha
00248   )
00249 {
00250   eol_sprite_draw_transformed_3d(
00251     sprite,
00252     frame,
00253     position,
00254     scale,
00255     eol_vec3d(0,0,0),
00256     eol_vec3d(1,1,1),
00257     alpha
00258   );

00260 
00261 void eol_sprite_draw_transformed_3d(
00262     eolSprite *sprite,
00263     eolUint frame,
00264     eolVec3D position,
00265     eolVec3D scale,
00266     eolVec3D rotation,
00267     eolVec3D color,
00268     eolFloat alpha
00269   )
00270 {
00271   eolRectFloat src;
00272   float left,right,top,bottom;
00273   if(sprite == NULL)
00274   {
00275     eol_logger_message(
00276         EOL_LOG_ERROR,
00277         "passed in a NULL sprite to draw.\n");
00278     return;
00279   }
00280   glDisable(GL_DEPTH_TEST);
00281   glEnable(GL_TEXTURE_2D);
00282   glEnable(GL_COLOR_MATERIAL);
00283   glBlendFunc(GL_SRC_ALPHA,GL_ONE_MINUS_SRC_ALPHA);
00284   glEnable(GL_BLEND);
00285   glColor4f(color.x,color.y,color.z,alpha);
00286   
00287   src.x = frame%sprite->framesPerLine * sprite->frameTextureWidth;
00288   src.y = frame/sprite->framesPerLine * sprite->frameTextureHeight;
00289   src.w = sprite->frameTextureWidth + src.x;
00290   src.h = sprite->frameTextureHeight + src.y;
00291 
00292   left = src.x;
00293   right = src.w;
00294   top = src.y;
00295   bottom = src.h;
00296   
00297   glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D,sprite->_glImage);
00298   glPushMatrix();
00299   glTranslatef(position.x,position.y,position.z);
00300   glRotatef(rotation.x, 1.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f);
00301   glRotatef(rotation.y, 0.0f, 1.0f, 0.0f);
00302   glRotatef(rotation.z, 0.0f, 0.0f, 1.0f);
00303   glScalef(scale.x,scale.y,scale.z);
00304   glTranslatef(sprite->x3D *  0.5f,sprite->y3D *  0.5f,0.0f);
00305   glTranslatef(sprite->x3D * -0.5f,sprite->y3D * -0.5f,0.0f);
00306   glBegin( GL_QUADS );
00307   
00308   glTexCoord2f(left,top);
00309   glVertex3f(-sprite->x3D/2,-sprite->y3D/2,0.0f);
00310   
00311   glTexCoord2f(left,bottom);
00312   glVertex3f(-sprite->x3D/2,sprite->y3D/2,0.0f);
00313   
00314   glTexCoord2f(right,bottom);
00315   glVertex3f(sprite->x3D/2,sprite->y3D/2,0.0f);
00316   
00317   glTexCoord2f(right,top);
00318   glVertex3f(sprite->x3D/2,-sprite->y3D/2,0.0f);
00319   
00320   glEnd( );
00321   glPopMatrix();
00322   glColor4f(1,1,1,1);
00323   glDisable(GL_BLEND);
00324   glDisable(GL_COLOR_MATERIAL);
00325   glDisable(GL_TEXTURE_2D);
00326   glEnable(GL_DEPTH_TEST);  
00327 }

00329 void eol_sprite_draw(
00330   eolSprite *sprite,
00331   eolUint    frame,
00332   eolInt     x,
00333   eolInt     y
00334 )
00335 {
00336   eol_sprite_draw_transformed(
00337     sprite,
00338     frame,
00339     x,
00340     y,
00341     1,
00342     1,
00343     0,
00344     eolFalse,
00345     eolFalse,
00346     eol_vec3d(1,1,1),
00347     1
00348   );

00350 
00351 void eol_sprite_draw_transformed(
00352     eolSprite *sprite,
00353     eolUint frame,
00354     eolInt x,
00355     eolInt y,
00356     eolFloat scaleX,
00357     eolFloat scaleY,
00358     eolFloat rotation,
00359     eolBool hFlip,
00360     eolBool vFlip,
00361     eolVec3D color,
00362     eolFloat alpha
00363   )
00364 {
00365   eolRectFloat src;
00366   eolVec3D pos;
00367   float left,right,top,bottom;
00368   if(sprite == NULL)
00369   {
00370     eol_logger_message(
00371         EOL_LOG_ERROR,
00372         "passed in a NULL sprite to draw.\n");
00373     return;
00374   }
00375   glDisable(GL_DEPTH_TEST);
00376   glEnable(GL_TEXTURE_2D);
00377   glEnable(GL_COLOR_MATERIAL);
00378   glBlendFunc(GL_SRC_ALPHA,GL_ONE_MINUS_SRC_ALPHA);
00379   glEnable(GL_BLEND);
00380   glColor4f(color.x,color.y,color.z,alpha);
00381   
00382   src.x = frame%sprite->framesPerLine * sprite->frameTextureWidth;
00383   src.y = frame/sprite->framesPerLine * sprite->frameTextureHeight;
00384   src.w = sprite->frameTextureWidth + src.x;
00385   src.h = sprite->frameTextureHeight + src.y;
00386   
00387     eol_opengl_get_gl_coordinate(
00388         x,
00389         y,
00390         EOL_2DPLANE_,
00391         _graphics_view.modelView,
00392         _graphics_view.projection,
00393         _graphics_view.viewPort,
00394         &pos.x,
00395         &pos.y,
00396         &pos.z
00397     );
00398   
00399   glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D,sprite->_glImage);
00400   if (!hFlip)
00401   {
00402     left = src.x;
00403     right = src.w;
00404   }
00405   else
00406   {
00407     left = src.w;
00408     right = src.x;
00409   }
00410   if (!vFlip)
00411   {
00412     top = src.y;
00413     bottom = src.h;
00414   }
00415   else
00416   {
00417     top = src.h;
00418     bottom = src.y;
00419   }
00420   glPushMatrix();
00421   glTranslatef(pos.x,pos.y,pos.z);
00422   glRotatef(rotation, 0.0f, 0.0f, 1.0f);
00423   glScalef(scaleX,scaleY,1);
00424   glTranslatef(sprite->x3D *  0.5f,sprite->y3D *  0.5f,0.0f);
00425   glBegin( GL_QUADS );
00426   
00427   glTexCoord2f(left,top);
00428   glVertex3f(-sprite->x3D/2,-sprite->y3D/2,0.0f);
00429   
00430   glTexCoord2f(left,bottom);
00431   glVertex3f(-sprite->x3D/2,sprite->y3D/2,0.0f);
00432   
00433   glTexCoord2f(right,bottom);
00434   glVertex3f(sprite->x3D/2,sprite->y3D/2,0.0f);
00435   
00436   glTexCoord2f(right,top);
00437   glVertex3f(sprite->x3D/2,-sprite->y3D/2,0.0f);
00438   
00439   glEnd( );
00440   glPopMatrix();
00441   glColor4f(1,1,1,1);
00442   glDisable(GL_BLEND);
00443   glDisable(GL_COLOR_MATERIAL);
00444   glDisable(GL_TEXTURE_2D);
00445   glEnable(GL_DEPTH_TEST);
00446 }
00447 
00448 void eol_sprite_free(eolSprite **sprite)
00449 {
00450   if (!eol_sprite_initialized())return;
00451   if (!sprite)return;
00452   if (!*sprite)return;
00453   if ((*sprite)->_refCount > 0)
00454   {
00455     (*sprite)->_refCount--;
00456   }
00457   *sprite = NULL;
00458 }
00459 
00460 void eol_sprite_clear_all()
00461 {
00462   int i;
00463   for(i = 0;i < _max_sprites;i++)
00464   {
00465     if(_sprite_list[i]._sdlSurface != NULL)
00466     {
00467       fprintf(stdout,"freeing sprite[%i]: %s\n",i,_sprite_list[i].filename);
00468       SDL_FreeSurface(_sprite_list[i]._sdlSurface);
00469     }
00470     if(glIsTexture(_sprite_list[i]._glImage) == GL_TRUE)
00471     {
00472       glDeleteTextures(
00473         1,
00474         &_sprite_list[i]._glImage
00475         );
00476     }
00477   }
00478   memset(_sprite_list,0,sizeof(eolSprite) * _max_sprites);
00479 }
00480 
00481 void eol_sprite_close()
00482 {
00483   eol_logger_message(
00484     EOL_LOG_INFO,
00485     "eol_sprite: closing\n");
00486   eol_sprite_clear_all();
00487   free(_sprite_list);
00488   _sprite_list = NULL;
00489   _num_sprites = 0;
00490   _sprite_init = eolFalse;
00491   eol_logger_message(
00492     EOL_LOG_INFO,
00493     "eol_sprite: closed\n");
00494 }
00495 
00501 SDL_Surface *_eol_load_image(char *filename)
00502 {
00503   SDL_Surface *image = NULL;
00504   SDL_RWops *rw;
00505   eolFile *efile = NULL;
00506   
00507   efile = eol_loader_read_file(filename);
00508 
00509   if (efile == NULL)
00510     return NULL;
00511 
00512   rw = SDL_RWFromMem(efile->_buffer, efile->size);
00513   if(rw == NULL)
00514   {
00515     eol_logger_message(
00516         EOL_LOG_ERROR,
00517         "eol_sprite: Unable to create RW reference to data loaded for %s\n",
00518         filename
00519       );
00520     eol_loader_close_file(&efile);
00521     return NULL;
00522   }
00523   image = IMG_Load_RW(rw,0);
00524   SDL_FreeRW(rw);
00525   eol_loader_close_file(&efile);
00526   return image;
00527 }
00528 
00529 void eol_sprite_set_gl_coordinates(eolSprite *sprite)
00530 {
00531     eol_opengl_get_gl_coordinate(
00532         ((_graphics_view.xRes>>1) + sprite->frameWidth),
00533         ((_graphics_view.yRes>>1) + sprite->frameHeight),
00534         EOL_2DPLANE_,
00535         _graphics_view.modelView,
00536         _graphics_view.projection,
00537         _graphics_view.viewPort,
00538         &sprite->x3D,
00539         &sprite->y3D,
00540         &sprite->z3D
00541     );
00542 }
